synopsis.text: Island-dweller Wu Liuqi, once living an idyllic existence on Xiaoji Island, finds his life shrouded in mystery due to a bout of amnesia. As strangers arrive on the island and begin to recognize him, nefarious plots unfurl, threatening the tranquility of Xiaoji Island. To safeguard his friends and their beloved home, Wu Liuqi embarks on a journey back to the Xuanwu Kingdom, a place where his destiny awaits. However, this journey brings him face-to-face with the seven Shadow Assassins, each harboring their own agenda and past. As the island braces for another crisis, Wu Liuqi must confront his destiny and make a choice that could alter the course of their lives.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
